comments.text:
FWIW, for me with 1366x768 &  Intel Core i5 460M:

* Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111203 Firefox/11.0a1: 20 FPS
* Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 6.1; U; Edition Next; en) Presto/2.10.238 Version/12.00 20-40 FPS
* Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.11 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/17.0.959.0 Safari/535.11: >60 FPS
* Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0): >60 FPS

comments.text: I suspect this is an SVG performance issue rather than a performance issue in GFX, but I might be wrong since I haven't profiled.
comments.raw_text: I suspect this is an SVG performance issue rather than a performance issue in GFX, but I might be wrong since I haven't profiled.
